section.title: ip_acl
section.para: This module exposes hooks the pre-flight execution of checks and applies user-specified ACLs to possible prevent the execution of the check.

example.title: Loading the ip_acl module.
example.para: This example loads the ip_acl module and creates a "global" ACL that denies any check running against the host 4.2.2.1 and the entier 10.0.0.0 RFC1819 space.
example.programlisting: <noit> <modules> <generic image="ip_acl" name="ip_acl" /> </modules> <checks> <config xmlns:ip_acl="noit://module/ip_acl"> <ip_acl:global/> </config> </checks> <acls> <acl name="global"> <rule type="deny">4.2.2.1/32</rule> <rule type="deny">10.0.0.0/8</rule> </acl> </acls> </noit>
